Text.Page:
So Jax wasn't kidding...new recruits.

I'll keep it simple: our organization profits when Cutthroat Harbor flourishes.
And it's hard to flourish around here with all the monsters. Go hunt arachnen stalkers and Red Lash enforcers on the eastern beach. We'll all profit.

Good job taking care of those pests so quickly. You've done this before, haven't you?

You know, that beach needs clearing on a daily basis. I'm just sayin'. Oh, and take this reward for your good work.
